member.name: T:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDImagePrivacyLevel
member.summary: Available image privacy levels for image masking.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDImagePrivacyLevel.MaskAll
member.summary: No images will be recorded.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDImagePrivacyLevel.MaskNonBundledOnly
member.summary: Only SF Symbols and images loaded using UIImage(named:) that are bundled within the application package will be recorded.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDImagePrivacyLevel.MaskNone
member.summary: All images will be recorded, including the ones downloaded from the Internet or generated during the app runtime.

member.name: T:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplay
member.summary: An entry point to the Datadog Session Replay feature.

member.name: M:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplay.Enable(Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfiguration)
member.summary: Enables Datadog Session Replay feature.

remarks.para: Recording will start automatically after enabling Session Replay.
Note: Session Replay requires the RUM feature to be enabled.

member.name: M:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplay.StartRecording
member.summary: Starts the recording manually.

member.name: M:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplay.StopRecording
member.summary: Stops the recording manually.

member.name: T:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfiguration
member.summary: Session Replay feature configuration.

member.name: C:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfiguration(System.Single,Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTextAndInputPrivacyLevel,Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDImagePrivacyLevel,Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTouchPrivacyLevel,Foundation.NSDictionary{Foundation.NSString,Foundation.NSNumber})
member.param: The sampling rate for Session Replay. It is applied in addition to the RUM session sample rate.
The way texts and inputs (e.g. label, textfield, checkbox) should be masked. Default: MaskAll.
Image recording privacy level. Default: MaskAll.
The way user touches (e.g. tap) should be masked. Default: Hide.
member.summary: Creates Session Replay configuration.

member.name: P:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfiguration.CustomEndpoint
member.summary: Custom server url for sending replay data. Default: NULL.

summary.para: Defines the way images should be masked.

member.name: P:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfiguration.ReplaySampleRate

summary.para: The sampling rate for Session Replay. It is applied in addition to the RUM session sample rate.
It must be a number between 0.0 and 100.0, where 0 means no replays will be recorded and 100 means all RUM sessions will contain replay.

member.remarks: Note: This sample rate is applied in addition to the RUM sample rate. For example, if RUM uses a sample rate of 80% and Session Replay uses a sample rate of 20%, it means that out of all user sessions, 80% will be included in RUM, and within those sessions, only 20% will have replays.

summary.para: Defines if the recording should start automatically. When true, the recording starts automatically; when false it doesn't, and the recording will need to be started manually.
Defines the way texts and inputs (e.g. labels, textfields, checkboxes) should be masked.
Defines the way user touches (e.g. tap) should be masked.

member.name: T:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfigurationPrivacyLevel
member.summary: Available privacy levels for content masking.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfigurationPrivacyLevel.Allow
member.summary: Record all content.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfigurationPrivacyLevel.Mask
member.summary: Mask all content.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDSessionReplayConfigurationPrivacyLevel.MaskUserInput
member.summary: Mask input elements, but record all other content.

member.name: T:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTextAndInputPrivacyLevel
member.summary: Available privacy levels for text and input masking.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTextAndInputPrivacyLevel.MaskAll
member.summary: Mask all text and input.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTextAndInputPrivacyLevel.MaskAllInputs
member.summary: Mask all text and input, eg. textfields, switches, checkboxes.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTextAndInputPrivacyLevel.MaskSensitiveInputs
member.summary: Show all text except sensitive input (eg. password fields).

member.name: T:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTouchPrivacyLevel
member.summary: Available privacy levels for content masking.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTouchPrivacyLevel.Hide
member.summary: Hide all touches.

member.name: F:Datadog.iOS.SessionReplay.DDTouchPrivacyLevel.Show
member.summary: Show all touches.
